text: 7|56|(Manitarkale! Camatanamum amaitiyum erpattu) natu cirtiruntiya pinnar atil visamam ceyyatirkal. (Iraivanutaiya tantanaikku) payantum, (avanutaiya canmanattai) virumpiyum, avanitam pirarttanai ceyyunkal. Niccayamaka allahvutaiya arul, nanmai ceyyum alakiya kunamutaiyavarkalukku mika camipattilirukkiratu
